verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There's a fun place in the garden where the lads and lassies meet For it wouldn't do to do the do they're doing in the street And the first time I did come there I was very much impressed By the young folk bust rufflin' up the cuckoos nest

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: And it's hi the cuckoo ho the cuckoo hi the cuckoos nest Hi the cuckoo ho the cuckoo hi the cuckoos nest I'll give any man a shilling, and a bottle of the best And ya ruffle up the feathers of the cuckoos nest

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I met her in the morning, and I took her in the night I'd never had another, so I had to do it right I'd never gone a wingful and I never would have guessed If she hadn't told me where to find the cuckoos nest

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And she told me where to find it and she told me where to go Through the prickles and the brambles where the little people go And the minute that I found it she would never let me rest 'Till I ruffled up the feathers of the cuckoos nest

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: It was blarney it was prickled it was feathered all around It was tucked into a corner and it wasn't easy found She said "God man you're buggering" I said it wasn't true And I left her with the makings of a young cuckoo
